name: Midnight snack
description:
You are new around here, aren’t you? I am Dolores, a succubus. My sisters and I have been hunting in the Upper World for ages, yet now it’s easier than ever. You can just order food with delivery, and it will arrive with a snack like pizza! It's so convenient! Come on, I'll show you.

  • Decide how Dolores has her dinner with foolish mortals
  • Several poses in full 3d and several "action" speeds for each
  • Full sex sound support for all posses
  • Clothes customization for Dolores
  • Freedom of movement while Dolores has her fun

The game is a 3D sex simulator where you can call in pizza boys and see how Dolores has fun with them in poses you pick. You can freely move and see the process from any angle.
